original_title: The Firm Body Sculpting System -  Cardio Sculpt Blaster
overview: For those days when you just can't find the time for a workout, Cardio Sculpt Blaster comes to the rescue! This successful workout keeps you motivated with interesting new moves!  Popular FIRM® Master Instructor Lisa Kay leads you through a fun and exciting mix of cardio exercises, both on the floor and using the Fanny Lifter™. This exciting new workout delivers maximum fat burning and motivates you to move, move, move! By concentrating on these exercises you will sculpt and blast your body, while shrinking your problem areas.
tagline: A quick and effective boredom-busting workout with maximum results!
title: The Firm Body Sculpting System -  Cardio Sculpt Blaster
